sect1.title: Installation of KOffice
sect1.para: KOffice is the integrated office suite for KDE.

KOffice also has many internationalization packages in the form of: koffice-i18n-xx-&koffice-version;.tar.bz2 where the xx is a two to five letter code for the country covered. The sizes of these files range from about 289 KB to 408 KB.
Install koffice with: ./configure --prefix=&kde-dir; --disable-debug && make && make install

sect2.title: koffice Installation Commmand explanations
sect2.para: The options are the same as for kde-base and are not repeated here.

sect2.title: Configuring koffice
sect2.para: There is no explicit configuration for the koffice package.
